summary: Half documentary half fiction film about sport and its importance in people with the eye of the 'Come and see' director Elem Klimov.
cast: Zinoviy Gerdt|Georgiy Svetlani|Yelena Novozhilova|Vladimir Andreyev|Vladimir Lyakhov|Valeri Brumel|German Klimov|Nikita Mikhalkov|Igor Klass|Boris Romanov|Larisa Shepitko|L. Ogienko|Evgeniy Matveev|V. Uteshev|Nina Dronova|A. Soshalskaya|Adolf Hitler|Jesse Owens|Alberto Sordi|Bob Soth
title: Sport, sport, sport
